org.typemeta.funcj.json

Interface JSValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJSValue, JSArray, JSBool, JSNull, JSNumber, JSObject, JSString

    public interface JSValue
    Common interface for classes that represent JSON values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSArray asArray()
      If this value is a JSArray then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.
      JSBool asBool()
      If this value is a JSBool then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.
      JSNull asNull()
      If this value is a JSNull then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.
      JSNumber asNumber()
      If this value is a JSNumber then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.
      JSObject asObject()
      If this value is a JSObject then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.
      JSString asString()
      If this value is a JSString then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.
      boolean isArray() 
      boolean isBool() 
      boolean isNull() 
      boolean isNumber() 
      boolean isObject() 
      boolean isString() 
      <T> T match(Functions.F<JSNull,T> fNull, Functions.F<JSBool,T> fBool, Functions.F<JSNumber,T> fNum, Functions.F<JSString,T> fStr, Functions.F<JSArray,T> fArr, Functions.F<JSObject,T> fObj)
      Select the one supplied function that corresponds to the type of this value, and return the result of applying the function to this value.
      Document toDocument()
      Construct a Document instance from the value, which can thern be used to pretty-print the JSON text representation of this value.
      default String toString(int width)
      Pretty-print this value as a JSON string.
      StringBuilder toString(StringBuilder sb)
      Write this value into the supplied StringBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        default String toString(int width)
        Pretty-print this value as a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        width - maximum line length
        Returns:
        string representation of formatted JSON

      • match

        <T> T match(Functions.F<JSNull,T> fNull,
            Functions.F<JSBool,T> fBool,
            Functions.F<JSNumber,T> fNum,
            Functions.F<JSString,T> fStr,
            Functions.F<JSArray,T> fArr,
            Functions.F<JSObject,T> fObj)
        Select the one supplied function that corresponds to the type of this value, and return the result of applying the function to this value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type of the functions
        Parameters:
        fNull - the function to be applied to a JSNull value
        fBool - the function to be applied to a JSBool value
        fNum - the function to be applied to a JSNumber value
        fStr - the function to be applied to a JSString value
        fArr - the function to be applied to a JSArray value
        fObj - the function to be applied to a JSObject value
        Returns:
        the result of applying the appropriate function to this value

      • isNull

        Returns:
        true if this value is a JSNull, otherwise false

        If this value is a JSNull then downcast it, otherwise throw an exception.

        Throws:
